runs.comm: drove away but a good stop at mid-off
dropped in to square leg and they hurry a single
flicked off his hips through the gap at square leg but picked up on the rope
wider ball but Chanderpaul gracefully places the ball through the covers and Vettori doesn't quite release the ball in time on the boundary and it's given as four runs
blocked down in to the leg-side
chipped away to mid-off
wide of off-stump and Gayle leaves it alone
wide again but this time Gayle plays a powerful cut over the top of point and the balls runs away for four
awesome! Gayle stands tall and smacks the ball through the covers. The fielders just stare and the ball flashes past them
bouncer from Southee which Gayle misses
swinging in towards off-stump and Gayle hits the ball in to his pads
good length again but Gayle tanks the ball over Southee's head and back down the ground for a one-bounce four
superb catch! A straight drive from Chanderpaul and it's going left of Mills but he dives down quick and takes a stunning grab with his left hand
blocked back to the bowler
whipped away off the legs and it reaches the rope at deep square leg
blocked away to point
blocked off the front foot back past the bowler
quick hands and he gets underneath it to drag the shot low in the air over midwicket but enough power for the ball to carry the boundary
fuller ball but far too much width and the ball is helped through the covers and the quick outfield takes the ball away down to the rope
great yorker and Gayle can do nothing but dig it out back to Southee
massive! Just a bit short and Gayle gets through the ball and lifts it straight over the bowlers head and it ends up about 12 rows back in the ground
slower ball but Gayle equal to it and it's clubbed low over midwicket and smacks in to the advertising boards for another six
fuller ball driven away to mid-off
full toss met by a not so well-timed cover drive and Ryder picks it up at deep cover
flicked off the body but picked up at fine leg
prodded away but picked up at backward point from a good diving stop by Flynn
slower ball outside off-stump which bamboozled Gayle who didn't play a stroke
and again. Slower and swinging away and Gayle prods at it and misses
slower outside off-stump. Left alone once more
slower outside off again and Gayle happy to leave those
In the air and the ball drops in to the gap short of deep midwicket and they run two
flashing cut over cover which needs only two bounces before reaching the rope
bowled on the legs and defended away to mid-on
slower delivery fools Marshall who misses the shot
blocked away to extra cover
slow full toss hit in to the ground which bounces over Oram's head towards mid-off
full toss driven to long-off
off the legs through square leg for one
leans it away with the spin down to short third man
flicked through midwicket and they have enough time to come back for the second
fuller flight played off his feet through midwicket
full again dug away to long-on
slower ball hacked away to midwicket
full toss and Marshall comes down the track for it. Straight drive which Oram picks up and throws back to the stumps. Marshall is struggling and dives feet first in to his crease just in time
straight drive splits the stumps at the other end
angled away to third man
bowls down the leg-side which clips the pad and runs behind the keeper for four leg byes
dropped down to short leg and they jog a single
flicked away with ease and beautiful timing over midwicket and in to the building site for another maximum for Gayle
chipped down to long-on
great reverse sweep beats the diving fielder at short fine leg and races away for four
dropped down to square leg for one more
cut away and picked up at deep point
fuller ball dug away to long-off
first ball! Vettori bowls one which keeps low and escapes under Marshall's defensive drive before going on and clipping his off-stump
cut away to deep point
too far down the leg-side
straight drive to long-on
turned away to fine leg
straight drive back to the bowler
fended away in to the covers
placed through the covers but picked up on the boundary
cut in to the ground and fielded at point
blocked to square leg
tries to drive but hits it down in to his pads
flicked away through square leg
too wide and cut away but great fielding by Flynn at point
blocked back to Vettori
turned through midwicket and they quickly run one
faster and flatter delivery cut away through point
turned away to long-off
down the leg-side and a thin bottom edge. McCullum whips off the bails but Sarwan got his foot back just in time
powerful off-side drive but solid fielding at short cover
full toss and a well-timed low straight drive whizzes back past Oram and scampers away for four
another powerful straight drive but too low and Oram stops it with his foot
guided through midwicket and picked up in the deep
full toss driven away to long-off
leg-stump half-volley and Gayle puts it away with ease and that's six anywhere! Clears the boundary by about 30 metres over midwicket
and another. Not as far and a bit higher but still clears the boundary safely over long-on. Great shot
Sarwan goes for the heroics but gets underneath it too much. The ball spins away high to Flynn at deep square leg where he takes the catch well
blocked back to the bowler
batted away down to long-off
nudged away down to third man
tries the same shot but misses this time. Played it too late
flicked off the legs through square leg and good running see them turn back for two
pitched up from Gayle and he goes for one to many and doesn't get hold of it. Taylor has plenty of time to think about it at long-off and takes a crucial catch
blocked to cover
flicks it off his toes towards fine leg
lifted with ease over midwicket and it goes all the way for six!
driven away to long-off
blocked in to the gap at square leg and they take a single
dropped to short leg and they take one
turns in towards the pads and big lbw appeal but turned down by umpire Billy Bowden
slower ball and he gets under it too much. The ball soars high in to the air and Patel takes a simple but important catch at long-off
attempts a flashing cut but misses
he picks up the slower ball and clubs it away through midwicket and it races away for four
plays and misses the cut again and a big appeal for McCullum for caught behind but no interest in the umpire
placed between the covers and they turn quickly for the second
slower delivery and pitched up. He gets under it too much and McCullum calls for it early and makes good ground to get underneath it with the gloves
tries to angle it down fine leg and misses
straight drive picked up at long-off
blocked din to the ground and picked up by midwicket
full ball hacked away to long-off
slower ball and he misses with the cut outside off
goes for the big shot and it goes high over his head behind the keeper and the ball drops in between three fielders who just couldn't get there in time. Quick turn and they come back for two
full toss on leg-stump. The batsmen misses with the drive and it misses leg-stump by a coat of paint! Big sigh from the players and the crowd
pulls it away through square leg. Picked up on the boundary
full toss which is pulled away through square leg and well-timed enough to reach the rope. Poor bowling
clipped in to square leg and they run one
good ball in to his body but it's blocked away to the leg-side and they hurry a single
improvised shot from Taylor as he shuffles across his stumps before angling the bat and leaning the ball over the short leg fielder using the pace of the bowler. Runs away for four
slower ball outside off stump and the batsmen misses
straight drive down the ground and it looks like just one. They turn quick and come back for a second and Mills cannot gather the ball at the stumps to complete the run-out
bottom edge squirts past McCullum and they pick up another
pulled away through square leg and they take one more
pitched up and going away from the batsmen. He takes a wild swipe at it and the ball just nicks off the toe and McCullum gathers the ball. First blood to the Kiwis
short of a length and Edwards misses with the pull shot
makes contact and driven through the off-side but picked up a deep cover. Just one and huge cheers from the crowd
swing and a miss and they try and run but it's suicide really as McCullum rolls the ball against the stumps
fuller and wide delivery which Benn takes a swipe at. It catches a thick outside edge and runs fine away for four! Light at the end of the tunnel for West Indies

he gets bat on it and angled away to backward point. Oram jumps on it and hold on to the ball as they sprint one. And that's it the game is tied! We will now have the first ever super over to settle the teams.
